quiz_item.error_analysis: 学生易因“scale”的常见义（如“鳞片”“比例”）或“beaufort”与“beautiful”的形近，将其误判为与“美丽装饰”或“物体大小评估”相关的概念。
quiz_item.sentence: The meteorologist warned that the storm would bring winds of Force 9 on the **beaufort scale**, which could uproot trees and damage buildings.
